title: Mobile-Based Inquiry Multimedia Learning Object Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Language Education Theories and Experience with Mobile Learning Tools
context.additional_context: For learners interested in creating language education content using digital devices, aiming to develop effective multimedia learning objects under time/technology/budget constraints

learning_goals: Learners can design and develop three types of multimedia learning objects optimized for mobile environments (quiz-based, scenario-based, simulation-based)
Learners can create language education content storyboards according to inquiry-based learning principles
Learners can complete a 5-minute mobile-compatible learning module using given authoring tools and receive peer evaluation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
